name: One Life (AkshR)
description:
A Fast Paced 1 player Game About controlling 2 Characters. The Game was made under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam.  

Use WASD Or the Arrow Keys To Control the Characters.

And Use Alpha Numbers  (The Numbers On Top Of The Keyboard) 1 and 2 to switch between characters. 

This Mega Package Includes  Robot teddy Bears, Weird Cartoonish spiders, And a lot more.

If you Enjoy this Game then please go ahead and Rate it!.

Thanks You For Even Viewing this!!
